attributes.action: Stop people claiming JSA who have no fixed aboud or use a "Friends Address"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are living with ther partner who are on income support but claim sepratley by using a friends address or relatives. Please stop this and make them prove they live where they live. Would cut down on fraud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
